review: it's a great movie ever made in indian history. it reflects how a housewife tries to conceal her originality to maintain dignity of her husband. this movie doesn't make you weep but leaves a lot of heart touching memories and questions before the audience which make them feel sad. acting skills of ajay devgan and aishwarya ray is incredibly awesome. just watch it.

its simple and beautiful . just talking to each other. a beautiful tale of  love shown in expression and melodius calm soothing envt. love it. one can only watch once to get a lasting effect . second will ruin it

the movie is full of melancholic emotions. both the main characters are  in denial mode till the last few minutes of the movie. the backdrop of rain and antique furniture simply adds to it. a brilliant movie made memorable by out of skin acting by aishwrya rai and ajay devgan..
